page.title: 10MILTONDUFF HALL
page.content: Miltonduff Hall was built in 1932 and the cloakroom and toilets were added in 1982.It is mainly used by people from Miltonduff and Mosstowie.It is very small but provides a lot of activities. Some people would like to see more. Social events are the most popular and are held approximately four times a year.In the winter the hall is used for a Youth Club and carpet bowling which is held twice a week.There are fourteen members who play home and away league matches in a twelve kilometer radius.Keep Fit takes over in the summer to shape people up for winter.Community meetings are held once a month. In the morning for two days a week playschool is held. .
